title: It's the navy
creator_credit: Commonwealth Cinema Branch Studios, Cinesound, E Brereton and Ralph Smart
brief_description: Shows all phases of the training of young recruits during World War II at Flinders Naval Depot, Crib Pt, Vic. Commentary by Harry Dearth and photography by Les Hendy.
